R's confidence in the existence of god

Source: R/gss_vars_116.R
god.Rd

god

Source

General Social Survey https://gss.norc.org

Details

Question Please look at this card and tell me which statement comes closest to expressing what you believe about God. I don”t believe in God.....................1 I don”t know whether there is a God and I don”t believe there is any way to find out..................................2 I don”t believe in a personal God, but I do believe in a Higher Power of some kind........................3 I find myself believing in God some of the time, but not at others........4 While I have doubts, I feel that I do believe in Godâ€¦.............................5 I know God really exists and I have no doubts about it...........................6

Values

  • 1 don't believe

  • 2 don't know, no way to find out

  • 3 higher power

  • 4 believe sometimes

  • 5 believe with doubts

  • 6 no doubts

  • NA(d) don't know / NA(i) iap / NA(j) I don't have a job / NA(m) dk, na, iap / NA(n) no answer / NA(p) not imputable / NA(r) refused / NA(s) skipped on web / NA(u) uncodeable / NA(x) not available in this release / NA(y) not available in this year / NA(z) see codebook

ballotsyears
